title: react hook 如何增加依赖更新
content:
背景

想将，业务逻辑按钮组封装为 hook,在移动端和 pc 端之间进行逻辑复用。在详情页面使用时候，发现并没有生效

原因： 无法给 useActions，增加依赖项，类似 useEffect 的第二参数一样。

查询了 ahooks 的 hook，了解类似解决方案

useActions

import { EUserType, EnumProblemStatus } from "@/const";
import { CommonModel } from "@/models";
import { useMemo } from "react";
import { useSelector } from "react-redux";

export const useActions = (detail) => {
  const user = useSelector(CommonModel.selectors.getUser);
  const { state: status } = detail;

  const userType = useMemo(() => {
    if (detail?.creatorPerson?.personId === user.staffId) {
      return EUserType.creator;
    }
    if (detail?.solverStaffPerson?.personId === user.staffId) {
      return EUserType.operator;
    }
    if (
      detail?.cooperationStaffs?.findIndex(
        (item) => item.personId === user.staffId
      ) > -1
    ) {
      return EUserType.helper;
    }
    return EUserType.other;
  }, [
    detail?.cooperationStaffs,
    detail.creatorPerson?.personId,
    detail?.solverStaffPerson?.personId,
    user?.staffId,
  ]);
  const btnComps = useMemo(
    () => ({
      // edit: {
      //   text: '编辑',
      //   key: 'edit',
      // },
      start_solve: {
        text: "开始处理",
        key: "start_solve",
        value: 2,
      },
      cancel: {
        text: "撤销",
        icon: "icon-huifu",
        disabledMessage: "非创建人不可撤销",
        key: "cancel",
        type: "default",
        confirm: true,
        value: 7,
        disabled: user.staffId !== detail?.creatorPerson?.personId,
      },
      trans: {
        text: "转交",
        icon: "icon-transfer",
        key: "trans",
        message: "请选择转交人",
        required: true,
        contact: true,
        limit: 1,
        allowType: ["staff"],
        defaultValue: [],
        disabledValues: [user.staffId],
        value: 8,
      },
      finish: {
        text: "完结",
        icon: "icon-guangbo",
        key: "finish",
        confirm: true,
        value: 6,
      },
      cuiBan: {
        text: "催办",
        key: "cuiBan",
        confirm: true,
        value: 12,
      },
      solved: {
        text: "已解决",
        icon: "icon-yiwancheng",
        key: "solved",
        confirm: true,
        value: 5,
      },
      changer: {
        text: "变更经办人",
        key: "changer",
        contact: true,
        limit: 1,
        allowType: ["staff"],
        defaultValue: [],
        message: "请选择转变更经办人",
        required: true,
        value: 8,
        disabledValues: [user.staffId],
      },
      add_helper: {
        text: "添加协作人",
        key: "add_helper",
        icon: "icon-teamwork",
        contact: true,
        allowType: ["staff"],
        defaultValue: [],
        message: "请选择协作人",
        required: true,
        value: 9,
      },
      notify_creator: {
        text: "提醒确认",
        key: "notify_creator",
        icon: "icon-querentixing",
        confirm: true,
        value: 13,
      },
      receiver: {
        text: "认领处理",
        key: "receiver",
        icon: "icon-receiver",
        confirm: true,
        value: 8,
      },
      exit_helper: {
        text: "退出协作",
        key: "exit_helper",
        confirm: true,
        value: 11,
      },
      join: {
        text: "加入协作",
        confirm: true,
        key: "join",
        value: 9,
      },
      continue: {
        text: "继续处理",
        key: "continue",
        value: 2,
      },
      end: {
        text: "完结",
        key: "end",
        confirm: true,
        value: 6,
      },
    }),
    [detail.problemId]
  );
  const actionBtns = useMemo(() => {
    const btns = [];
    switch (status) {
      case EnumProblemStatus.waiting:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            // btns.push(btnComps.edit)
            btns.push(btnComps.cancel);
            btns.push(btnComps.cuiBan);
            btns.push(btnComps.changer);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.trans);
            btns.push(btnComps.start_solve);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.helper:
            btns.push(btnComps.exit_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.other:
            btns.push(btnComps.receiver);
            btns.push(btnComps.join);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.processing:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            // btns.push(btnComps.edit)
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.trans);
            btns.push(btnComps.solved);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.helper:
            btns.push(btnComps.exit_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.other:
            btns.push(btnComps.receiver);
            btns.push(btnComps.join);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.delay:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            // btns.push(btnComps.edit)
            btns.push(btnComps.cancel);
            btns.push(btnComps.cuiBan);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.trans);
            btns.push(btnComps.solved);
            btns.push(btnComps.continue);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.helper:
            btns.push(btnComps.exit_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.other:
            btns.push(btnComps.receiver);
            btns.push(btnComps.join);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.overdue:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            // btns.push(btnComps.edit)
            btns.push(btnComps.cancel);
            btns.push(btnComps.cuiBan);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.trans);
            btns.push(btnComps.solved);
            btns.push(btnComps.continue);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.helper:
            btns.push(btnComps.exit_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.other:
            btns.push(btnComps.receiver);
            btns.push(btnComps.join);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.solved:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            btns.push(btnComps.end);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.notify_creator);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.finish:
        break;

      case EnumProblemStatus.cancel:
        break;

      default:
        break;
    }
    return btns;
  }, [detail.status, userType]);

  return actionBtns;
};

ahooks 中 依赖刷新

见

useRequest 提供了一个 options.refreshDeps 参数，当它的值变化后，会重新触发请求。

const [userId, setUserId] = useState("1");

const { data, run } = useRequest(() => getUserSchool(userId), {
  refreshDeps: [userId],
});

上面的示例代码，useRequest 会在初始化和 userId 变化时，触发函数执行。

与下面代码实现功能完全一致

const [userId, setUserId] = useState("1");

const { data, refresh } = useRequest(() => getUserSchool(userId));

useEffect(() => {
  refresh();
}, [userId]);

export default function useCreation<T>(factory: () => T, deps: DependencyList) {

useCreation

usecreation

function useCreation<T>(factory: () => T, deps: any[]): T;
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { useCreation } from "ahooks";

class Foo {
  constructor() {
    this.data = Math.random();
  }

  data: number;
}

export default function () {
  const foo = useCreation(() => new Foo(), []); // 依赖项没变化， 不会重复执行 factory
  const [, setFlag] = useState({});
  return (
    <>
      <p>{foo.data}</p>
      <button
        type="button"
        onClick={() => {
          setFlag({}); // 对象更新
        }}
      >
        Rerender
      </button>
    </>
  );
}

// useActions
import { EnumProblemStatus, EUserType } from "@/const";
import { IProblemDetail } from "@/services/problems";
import { useMemo } from "react";

export const useActions = (
  detail: IProblemDetail,
  user: Staff,
  mobile = false
) => {
  const userType = useMemo(() => {
    if (detail?.creatorPerson?.personId === user.staffId) {
      return EUserType.creator;
    }
    if (detail?.solverStaffPerson?.personId === user.staffId) {
      return EUserType.operator;
    }
    if (
      detail?.cooperationStaffs?.findIndex(
        (item) => item.personId === user.staffId
      ) > -1
    ) {
      return EUserType.helper;
    }
    return EUserType.other;
  }, [
    detail?.cooperationStaffs,
    detail.creatorPerson?.personId,
    detail?.solverStaffPerson?.personId,
    user?.staffId,
  ]);

  const btnComps = useMemo(() => {
    const { creatorPerson, solverStaffPerson, cooperationStaffs = [] } = detail;
    if (!creatorPerson) return;

    const disabled_solverStaffPersonIds = []
      .concat(creatorPerson.personId)
      .concat(solverStaffPerson.personId || []);

    const disabled_cooperationStaffsIds = []
      .concat(creatorPerson.personId)
      .concat(solverStaffPerson.personId || [])
      .concat(cooperationStaffs.map((item) => item.personId));

    return {
      // edit: {
      //   title: '编辑',
      //   key: 'edit',
      // },
      comment: {
        title: "评论",
        key: "comment",
        icon: "icon-kuaisuhuifu",
        keep: true,
      },
      start_solve: {
        title: "开始处理",
        key: "start_solve",
        icon: "icon-kaishi",
        value: 2,
      },
      cancel: {
        title: "撤销",
        icon: "icon-huifu",
        disabledMessage: "非创建人不可撤销",
        key: "cancel",
        type: "default",
        confirm: true,
        value: 7,
      },
      trans: {
        title: "转交",
        icon: "icon-transfer",
        key: "trans",
        message: "请选择转交人",
        required: true,
        contact: true,
        limit: 1,
        allowType: ["staff"],
        defaultValue: [],
        disabledValues: disabled_solverStaffPersonIds,
        value: 8,
      },
      finish: {
        title: "完结",
        icon: "icon-guangbo",
        key: "finish",
        confirm: true,
        value: 6,
      },
      cuiBan: {
        title: "催办",
        key: "cuiBan",
        icon: "icon-guangbo",
        confirm: true,
        value: 12,
      },
      solved: {
        title: "已解决",
        icon: "icon-yiwancheng",
        key: "solved",
        confirm: true,
        value: 5,
      },
      changer: {
        title: "变更经办人",
        key: "changer",
        contact: true,
        icon: "icon-transfer",
        limit: 1,
        allowType: ["staff"],
        defaultValue: [],
        message: "请选择转变更经办人",
        required: true,
        value: 8,
        disabledValues: disabled_solverStaffPersonIds,
      },
      add_helper: {
        title: "添加协作人",
        key: "add_helper",
        icon: "icon-teamwork",
        contact: true,
        allowType: ["staff"],
        defaultValue: [],
        message: "请选择协作人",
        required: true,
        value: 9,
        disabledValues: disabled_cooperationStaffsIds,
      },
      notify_creator: {
        title: "提醒确认",
        key: "notify_creator",
        icon: "icon-querentixing",
        confirm: true,
        value: 13,
      },
      receiver: {
        title: "认领处理",
        key: "receiver",
        icon: "icon-receiver",
        confirm: true,
        value: 8,
      },
      exit_helper: {
        title: "退出协作",
        key: "exit_helper",
        confirm: true,
        icon: "icon-tuichu",
        value: 11,
      },
      join: {
        title: "加入协作",
        confirm: true,
        key: "join",
        icon: "icon-join",
        value: 9,
      },
      continue: {
        title: "继续处理",
        key: "continue",
        value: 2,
      },
      end: {
        title: "完结",
        key: "end",
        confirm: true,
        icon: "icon-jieshu",
        value: 6,
      },
    };
  }, [detail]);

  const actions = useMemo(() => {
    const btns = [];
    const solverId = detail.solverStaffPerson?.personId;
    if (!btnComps) return [];

    mobile && btns.push(btnComps.comment);
    switch (detail.state) {
      case EnumProblemStatus.waiting:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            // btns.push(btnComps.edit)
            btns.push(btnComps.cancel);
            btns.push(btnComps.cuiBan);
            btns.push(btnComps.changer);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.trans);
            btns.push(btnComps.start_solve);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.helper:
            btns.push(btnComps.exit_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.other:
            btns.push(btnComps.receiver);
            btns.push(btnComps.join);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.processing:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            // btns.push(btnComps.edit)
            !solverId && btns.push(btnComps.changer);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.trans);
            btns.push(btnComps.solved);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.helper:
            btns.push(btnComps.exit_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.other:
            btns.push(btnComps.receiver);
            btns.push(btnComps.join);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.delay:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            // btns.push(btnComps.edit)
            btns.push(btnComps.cancel);
            btns.push(btnComps.cuiBan);
            !solverId && btns.push(btnComps.changer);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.trans);
            btns.push(btnComps.solved);
            btns.push(btnComps.continue);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.helper:
            btns.push(btnComps.exit_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.other:
            btns.push(btnComps.receiver);
            btns.push(btnComps.join);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.overdue:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            // btns.push(btnComps.edit)
            btns.push(btnComps.cancel);
            btns.push(btnComps.cuiBan);
            !solverId && btns.push(btnComps.changer);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.trans);
            btns.push(btnComps.solved);
            btns.push(btnComps.continue);
            btns.push(btnComps.add_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.helper:
            btns.push(btnComps.exit_helper);
            break;
          case EUserType.other:
            btns.push(btnComps.receiver);
            btns.push(btnComps.join);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.solved:
        switch (userType) {
          case EUserType.creator:
            btns.push(btnComps.end);
            break;
          case EUserType.operator:
            btns.push(btnComps.notify_creator);
            break;
          default:
        }
        break;
      case EnumProblemStatus.finish:
        break;

      case EnumProblemStatus.cancel:
        break;

      default:
        break;
    }
    return btns;
  }, [
    detail.solverStaffPerson?.personId,
    detail.state,
    btnComps,
    mobile,
    userType,
  ]);
  return actions;
};
// 使用
const actionBtns = useActions(detail, user);
